external_games.name: Hacker Evolution Duality: Inception Part 3 DLC

name: Hacker Evolution Duality: Inception Part 3
summary: Extend your gaming experience with 10 new levels contained in this new DLC. The INCEPTION series is going back to the roots of the Hacker Evolution games. The levels from the original Hacker Evolution Untold game have been remastered for the new Hacker Evolution Duality engine.
